backend/main.mo: Motoko actor defining three public shared functions: getGreeting (returns message from Greeting type), double (returns 2x input Nat), and concatenateMessage (concatenates message with sender, includes assertions for validation).
feature_evidence.json: Feature evidence report documenting two high-confidence features related to deployment error resolution and frontend import validation, listing affected files, components, and test IDs.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON-formatted summaries of frontend files describing the ILF Home website structure including routing, pages (home, community, housing, support, volunteer), layout components, hooks, and styling with warm earth-tone color palette.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables defining a warm, neutral color palette using OKLCH color space for both light and dark modes, including sidebar, chart, and semantic color tokens.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point with UTF-8 charset, viewport meta tag, title 'ILF Home Website', root div, and module script loading main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Main React app component setting up TanStack Router with root layout (Header/Footer) and five routes (home, community, housing, support, volunteer), wrapped in QueryClientProvider.
frontend/src/components/layout/Footer.ts: Footer component with three-column grid layout displaying organization info, quick navigation links, contact details, copyright notice, and Caffeine.ai attribution with UTM tracking.
frontend/src/components/layout/Header.ts: Sticky header with logo, desktop navigation menu, and mobile sheet menu using TanStack Router for navigation with active route highlighting and responsive design.
frontend/src/components/sections/Contact: Contact section with three contact info cards (phone, email, address) and a controlled form component that displays success toast on submission using the useToast hook.
frontend/src/components/sections/HeroSec: Hero section with gradient background, headline, description, two CTA buttons (Get Help, Get Involved) using TanStack Router navigation, and hero image with responsive layout.
frontend/src/hooks/use-toast.ts: Implements a toast notification system with a custom hook and state management using listeners, supporting add/remove actions with auto-dismiss after 5 seconds and a limit of 1 toast.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Provides a React hook to manage backend actor instances with authentication, creating actors based on Internet Identity state and invalidating dependent queries when the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements Internet Identity authentication context and provider for ICP, managing login/logout flow, identity persistence, and delegation validation with configurable AuthClient options.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for backend API calls including useGetGreeting and useDouble, both dependent on authenticated actor availability.
frontend/src/index.css: Defines Tailwind CSS configuration with custom CSS variables for a warm earth-toned color palette supporting both light and dark modes.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that sets up React root with QueryClient and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the main App component.
frontend/src/pages/CommunityPage.tsx: Displays community programs page with hero section, program cards (support groups, events, mentorship, workshops), and impact section highlighting the importance of social connections.
frontend/src/pages/HomePage.tsx: Main landing page featuring hero section, about section describing ILF Home's mission, and service cards for housing, community, support, and volunteer programs with navigation.
frontend/src/pages/HousingPage.tsx: Housing services page displaying emergency shelter, transitional housing, permanent supportive housing, and housing navigation services with eligibility criteria and call-to-action.
frontend/src/pages/SupportPage.tsx: React page component displaying comprehensive support services (employment, education, case management, crisis intervention) and specialized programs for different populations (re-entry, aged-out teens, families, homeless) with hero section, service cards, and contact section.
frontend/src/pages/VolunteerPage.tsx: React page component for volunteer and donation opportunities, featuring ways to support (volunteer time, donations, goods, corporate partnerships), impact statistics, and a contact section with cards and icons.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration with custom theme extensions including OKLCH color system, Inter font, container settings, custom animations (accordion), and plugins for typography, container queries, and animations.
project_state.json: Project state tracking file documenting ILF Home website features, requirements, architectural notes about target audiences (homeless, low-income families, jail re-entry, aged-out teens), and deployment issue resolution status.
